outputs.output_descr: Through this proposed intervention, UNDP seeks to support the government's overall strategy for reducing and managing disaster impacts and losses  thereby contribute to the country's sustainable human development. The project will target strengthening of institutions responsible for disaster risk reduction both at national and county levels in areas of policy enactment, implementation and monitoring; establishment of mechanisms for assessing and monitoring of disaster losses and impacts; support in mainstreaming DRR into government planning and budgeting process; disaster information management systems and partnerships.
